                                                                               
 Usage: langchain serve [OPTIONS]                                              
                                                                               
 Start the LangServe app, whether it's a template or an app.                   
                                                                               
+- Options -------------------------------------------------------------------+
| --port        INTEGER  The port to run the server on                        |
| --host        TEXT     The host to run the server on                        |
| --help                 Show this message and exit.                          |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
